mapper.insert: insert into date_standard (id, agemin, agemax, heightmin, heightmax, salary, education, address, marrige, userid) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agemin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{agemax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heightmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{heightmax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marrige,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update date_standard set agemin = #{agemin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, agemax = #{agemax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heightmin = #{heightmin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, heightmax = #{heightmax,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marrige = #{marrige,jdbcType=TINYINT}, userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, agemin, agemax, heightmin, heightmax, salary, education, address, marrige, userid from date_standard where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, agemin, agemax, heightmin, heightmax, salary, education, address, marrige, userid from date_standard where userid = #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, agemin, agemax, heightmin, heightmax, salary, education, address, marrige, userid from date_standard
